data.Name: Ben Harper And The Innocent Criminals
data.Bio: Benjamin Chase "Ben" Harper (born October 28, 1969) is an American musician. Harper was born in Claremont, in California's Pomona Valley. He began playing guitar as a child. His maternal grandparents' music store The Folk Music Center and Museum laid a foundation of folk and blues for the artist, complemented by regular patrons of Leonard Cohen, Taj Mahal and David Lindley and quotes of William Shakespeare and Robert Frost made often by his grandfather.
